name: bargain-travels
description: Search for information on your next travelling destination and be able to purchase some of our merchandise

scripts.build: parcel build public/home.html public/about-page.html public/city-page.html public/shop-page.html public/products/hoody-info.hmtl public/products/jacket-info.hmtl public/products/longsleeve-info.hmtl public/products/pullover-info.hmtl public/products/sweatpants-info.hmtl public/products/t-shirt-info.hmtl public/shopping-cart-page.html public/trips-page.html
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Dylan Gangat
